metadata.title: CVE-2017-0549 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A remote denial of service vulnerability in libavc in Mediaserver couldenable an attacker to use a specially crafted file to cause a device hangor reboot. This issue is rated as High severity due to the possibility ofremote denial of service. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0,7.1.1. Android ID: A-33818508.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
